request.description:
This test case will check whether the api endpoint is up and running or not. If running, the Status code should be 201,Body should matches string: "created" and Status code name should have string: "created"

For best practice: If api is running status code should be 200 , status code name should have string: "OK"
For best practice: If api is not running status code should be 503  and status code name should have string: "Service Unavailable"

If the api is not up and running, then all furhter test should be cancelled. This funtions should be written here.
